name: @rusty-butter/discord-bot-mcp
description: Discord Bot MCP server with voice transcription (Gemini) and text-to-speech (ElevenLabs)

scripts.server:start: mkdir -p logs && nohup tsx src/index.ts > logs/discord-bot-mcp.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .discord-bot-mcp.pid
scripts.server:start:sse: mkdir -p logs && nohup tsx src/index.ts --sse > logs/discord-bot-mcp.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .discord-bot-mcp.pid
scripts.server:stop: if [ -f .discord-bot-mcp.pid ]; then kill -TERM $(cat .discord-bot-mcp.pid) 2>/dev/null && rm .discord-bot-mcp.pid; else pkill -f 'tsx src/index.ts'; fi
scripts.server:restart: pnpm run server:stop && sleep 2 && pnpm run server:start
scripts.server:restart:sse: pnpm run server:stop && sleep 2 && pnpm run server:start:sse
scripts.server:status: if [ -f .discord-bot-mcp.pid ] && ps -p $(cat .discord-bot-mcp.pid) > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo '✅ Server is running (PID: '$(cat .discord-bot-mcp.pid)')'; else echo '❌ Server is not running'; fi
